attributes.action: We the people of the United Kingdom must be aloud a general election.
attributes.additional_details:
MP’s should and must remember it is their duty to represent the majority vote of their constituency any thing else is not democracy.

The MP’s who held their in house vote to decide that the 2016 referendum majority result to leave the European Union can be morphed into something no one voted for is undemocratic and unacceptable showing intolerance and placing their own views above that of the electorate.

It is the people’s choice and we demand a general election before the end of October 2019.
attributes.background:
It is clear the opposition parties are determined to thwart the Prime Minister Boris Johnson in carrying out the 2016 referendum result and holding a general election. “because they know they will loose”

We are sovereign and must be able to select who we want to represent us in parliament
